cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils

Class FileCredentialStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils.FileCredentialStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CredentialStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecureFileCredentialStore

    public class FileCredentialStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements CredentialStore
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.utils/FileCredentialStore.java

    Implementation of the CredentialStore using simple {java.io.File} as a base for storing the tokens.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

      • deleteCredential

        public void deleteCredential(java.lang.String identifier)
        Remove existing OAuth2Token from the store.
        Specified by:
        deleteCredential in interface CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier if the token in the store.

      • generateRandomId

        private java.lang.String generateRandomId()
        Generates a new unique random identifier for storing a token in the store. Number of tries to generate a unique identifier is limited. If the limit is reached, empty string is returned.
        Returns:
        Random identifier.

      • getCredentialFile

        public java.io.File getCredentialFile()
        Returns the file used as a credential store.
        Returns:
        File used.

      • retrieveCredential

        public OAuth2Token retrieveCredential(java.lang.String identifier)
        Returns OAuth2Token from the store identified by identifier.
        Specified by:
        retrieveCredential in interface CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of the token in the store.
        Returns:
        Returns the token, if it exists. If not, null is returned.

      • storeCredential

        public java.lang.String storeCredential(java.lang.String identifier,
                               OAuth2Token token)
        Update existing OAuth2Token or save it with custom identifier.
        Specified by:
        storeCredential in interface CredentialStore
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier of the token in the store.
        token - Token to be saved.
        Returns:
        Assigned identifier, if the supplied one wasn't valid.
